ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(LEN(pse__Budget_Header__c)>0,NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(pse__Budget_Header__r.pse__Type__c,'Vendor Purchase Order'), ISPICKVAL(pse__Budget_Header__r.pse__Type__c,'Vendor Purchase Order Change Order'))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invoice items may only be applied to Budget Headers with the type Vendor Purchase Order or Vendor Purchase Order Change Order
